root.str: <font color="#00FFAA">Narrator Drone:</font> With the disappearance of the previous Nanite Systems representative, Ayla had inherited additional duties and a seemingly unending pile of paperwork on Sanctuary.
Increases the Afterburner Fuel capacity by 25% [ORPHANED SKILL LINE DNT].
Wait up! Let me hop in!

This special edition Punisher is a next-gen PDW built with close-quarters aggression in mind. The in-built underbarrel fires fragmentation grenades, and can be adapted to fire class-specific ammunition instead. All factions can use NS weapons.
The semi-auto BAR-100 is capable of engagement distances nearing that of a sniper rifle, while retaining the versatility of a lighter weapon. NSO use only.

This low altitude hover buoy has been outfitted with a self-repair nanite projector that repairs all allied vehicles within 100 meters. <font color="#dc9c36">This item expires at the end of the Campaign.</font>
Adds cosmetic plating to your Sunderer. All factions can use this gear.
Increases the power of the deployment shield by 70%.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.4 seconds.

<font color="#00FFAA">Field Officer Knightly:</font> The Tempest Capacitor is the beating heart of the Containment Site. Esamir is safer if the Tempest Siphon remains active, but you can't get to that capture point while it is.

While deployed, the Prowler generates shield layer at a rate of 100 shield per second, to a maximum of 1000 shield health. Taking damage pauses shield regeneration for 4 seconds, and a fully depleted shield will not begin regenerating until out of combat for 10 seconds.
<font color="#00FFAA">Facilitator Campner:</font> A matchmaking contest? That sounds wonderful! Where do I sign up? Take my money!
<font color="#00FFAA">Warden Hadley:</font> That signal is weak. You'll need to restart the download and stay near the database unit.
This controls sounds for the entire game. (Default: 1.0)
Customize your operative's voice with this feminine sounding Greenhorn Voice Pack.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 22 shells.
Allows the squad leader to calibrate the NC's mass driver array to hammer an area with artillery fire.

<font color="#00FFAA">Representative Nalla:</font> A battery for our NS-1317X! This will improve communications with our ground teams and reduce the number of trips they will need to make back to Sanctuary. I'm sure everyone will appreciate that!
Adds 4 rounds to the default magazine size.
Grants access to grenades which simulate the sound of weapons fire, project false radar signatures, and fool automated anti-infantry turrets.
Celebrate this fortuitous holiday with festive items, available for a limited time.
Increases the roll rate of the Scythe by 8 degrees/second.
Nanites constantly repair damage over time at a rate of 4.38% every 5 seconds. Damage disables auto repair for 12 seconds.
A standardized reflex sight designed to promote faster precision aiming.
You can only send tells to friends and outfit members while auto-refusing tells.
This high-capacity variant of the M18 Needler is fitted for interceptor variants of the Mosquito fighter craft. TR use only.

Increases the time required for seeking weapons to establish a lock by 1 second, prevents the vehicle from being auto detected on the mini-map and reduces detection from enemy Engagement Radars by 450 meters.
Single Use Indar Canyons v2 Vehicle Camo
Earn points by holding Wainwright Armory, Bunker J993, Hunter's Blind, Gourney Dam, Broken Vale Garrison, Woodman ASE Labs, or Nason's Defiance.
Friendly asleep on the job? Wake them up with this horn!
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 33 rockets.
Applies a decal to your armor. TR use only.
Activate to repair 15% of the vehicle health over 5 seconds. If the vehicle is on fire when activated, it will also immediately extinguish the flames. Can be activated once every 55 seconds.
The Titan-150 AP is loaded with fast moving armor piercing rounds that are stronger against armored targets but inflict almost no explosive damage. NC use only.

While in the pilot seat of a vehicle, your vehicle's Nanite Auto-Repair and Pilot Synergy health regeneration delay is reduced by 3 seconds. Additionally, you no longer receive damage over time when your vehicle is in a critical state.
<font color="#00FFAA">Warden Hadley:</font> That's weird. It's another lab. Although it does look more modern than the area upstairs.
Adds the Drifter style hubcaps to your Sunderer. TR use only.
<font color="#7FF4FF">/squad kick <playername></font> - Kicks a player from your squad if you have permission to do so.
Allows the Light Assault to carry additional Rocklet Rifle magazines, and auto-reloads the weapon while holstered.
This special, Auraxium variant of the Commando combat knife represents the operative's mastery at striking when least expected.

Shields can be disabled by overloading the generators that power them. A generator will have an icon that matches the shield it powers. To disable a shield, stand next to the generator and hold down the Interact key to start the overload process. While it is overloading defenders can interact with it to stabilize it, so keep the area clear of enemies until it explodes.
Can carry 4 additional rockets of any type.
Adds Lumifiber Trim to the Harasser. NC use only.
Which is more important to you?
Increases the Idle Timer on the Lightning to 18 minutes.
Decreases muzzle flash and audio range.
Constructs a large, fortified lumifiber trimed wall with firing areas for infantry. This object shares it's maximum in world limit with at least one other construction item.
Visit the Observation Deck on Sanctuary
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 10 missiles.
Allows soldiers to carry additional magazines for both their primary and sidearm weapons
Attempting to capture <font color=\"#00C3FF\">[*region*]</font> from <font color=\"#00C3FF\">[*faction*]</font>. <font color=\"#FF0000\">Need reinforcements!</font>
Further reduces the amount of damage taken from explosions.

It's time to welcome a major technical update, six months in the making. We've officially upgraded our renderer to DX11, and all compatible hardware should be receiving substantial increases in performance! This update is fresh out of the nano-printer, so there are bound to be some issues; please use the /bug command as you find them.

On top of that, we've revamped the spawn system, added a new continent event type, and we've also added a new faction of robotic allies (and enemies) that fight for the lowest populated faction! We hope you enjoy this update, and the many more to follow this year.
Adds 3 rounds to the default magazine size.
Personalize your Sunderer with custom hubcaps. VS use only.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 3 shots.
Adds Lumifiber Trim to the Valkyrie. All factions can use this gear.
The VS Triumph Flare Gun fires a variety of entertaining flare patterns. VS use only.
Infiltrators can convert enemy terminals and turrets to their own faction's control via hacking. Destroyed equipment cannot be hacked.
Apply the single use Desert Scrub v1 camo pattern to your armor. TR use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
Apply the single use Temperate Forest camo pattern to your weapon. TR use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 16.
Adds the Gold Sandblaster Windshield to the Harasser. All factions can use this gear.
Improved turn, roll, and agility. (More effective than previous rank)
Allows the Infiltrator to use the "Bouncing Betty" proximity mine.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 8 missiles.
Adds green chassis lights to the under carriage of the Harasser. VS use only.
The CAS 14-E is designed to provide close air support using its 14mm explosive rounds and high magazine capacity to effectively eliminate hostile personnel. All factions can use this weapon.
Reduces minimum cone of fire and cone of fire recovery time.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 500 rounds.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.1 seconds.

This special, versatile variant of the CARV can adapt to nearly any situation thanks to its multiple firing modes and wide range of attachments. Compared to its predecessor, it features a slightly slower rate of fire and more controllable recoil. TR use only.

<font color="#00FFAA">FL-34: </font> So before we get started, I sent down an untraceable Javelin grav-cycle. Left the keys in the Colossus terminal at your Warpgate. Might not be necessary, but it'll be fun. Up to you.
Decreases the turrets cool down period after each shot to 5 seconds.
Switch to Engineer and repair the Vehicle Terminal!
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.6 seconds.
Add chrome hubcaps to the Flash
While piloting a Galaxy or Valkyrie on Esamir, travel more than 1500m in a storm with at least 2 additional occupants inside.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 6.25%
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 3 shots.
Advances in plasma manipulation technology have resulted in the VE-S Canis, a compact, close range weapon with a firing rate that increases over time. VS use only.
Improve the Vanguard's maximum forward speed and acceleration.
A facility that is being captured will have an additional capture status indicator around its facility icon.
Could not transfer fireteam leadership to that player.

Celebrate seven years of PlanetSide 2 with this massive bundle. Note: Bundle contains weapons and cosmetics for VS/NC/TR/NSO empires. Heroic Boost is granted only to the character that purchases the bundle. "Perfect" Implants are granted account-wide, and cannot be broken down.
Improves the sensor darts scanning rate by a total of 1 second and extends the range to 45 meters; also extends each darts lifespan to 40 seconds and increases ammo capacity by a total of 2.
You can always redeploy to a new location from the map screen.
Error adding item to order. Please try again later.
Kill enemies by running over them or earn ram bonuses while in a Sunderer.
The Colossus Heavy Tank can deploy into a skylance battery to strike at Bastion Fleet Carriers from long range.
Rapidly locks on to and destroys aircraft
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 160 rounds.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 360 rounds.
Increases the top speed of the Flash by 2 KPH.
Wearable by all non-Max classes. VS use only.
<font color="#00FFAA">Praetor Umatherin:</font> We have much to discuss, acolyte. Meet me on the deck of the carrier.
Unable to read the file you are attempting to upload.
Engineer: Kill 100 enemies with Turrets you've deployed
Additional Character Slots can be unlocked through the <font color='#7FF4FF'>DEPOT</font> or <font color='#7FF4FF'>Membership</font>.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 120 rounds.
<font color="#00FFAA">Foster:</font> These vehicles seem to have absorbed the brunt of the explosion. I'm surprised they weren't destroyed outright. What protected them, I wonder?
Apply the single use Amerish Scrub camo pattern to your armor. NC use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
Error: Mentor squads cannot merge with other squads.
Apply the Stone Cold camo pattern to your weapon. TR use only.
Single Use Indar Savanna Vehicle Camo
The Purifiers have devised a way to slow the progress of our enemies. Inject this virus into exposed consoles at the target bases.

New technology capable of defending against Esamir's rampant energy comes to the fore, but has yet to be proven out. Representative Foster charges you with testing a new Insulated Suit within the roaming electrical storm. With success, the concept could be expanded upon, bringing some much needed stability to the tenuous state of Esamir.
The MR1 Fracture is a dual rotary cannon that fires self-propelled, high velocity rockets designed specifically to penetrate vehicle armor. TR use only.

<font color="#00FFAA">Campner:</font> Operative, please contact us when you next arrive on Esamir. I have been informed that a fix has been applied and your assistance with making repairs and removing intruders would be appreciated.
VS need at least 36% territory control
Additional composite plating to complement the look of your soldier. TR use only.
VS: MAX: Flame 01: Right Silver Medal
Improve the Magrider's maximum forward speed, acceleration and hover power.
Spawn Room Force Field - K Bldg
<font color="#00FFAA">Campner:</font> This network is now under our control. Please advance to the final target.
Press [%s] to access NS specialty terminal
Increases the Idle Timer on the Mosquito to 13 minutes.
<font color="#00FFAA">Foster:</font> Regardless, our first steps are to test the suit's resilience here. Consider this a combat training excercise, I'm sure your chain of command would approve.
Adds Lumifiber Trim to the Harasser. NC use only.

<font color="#dc9c36">All Access Members have the option of aligning Nanite Systems Operative characters with a "home faction" of their choice, and gain the ability to join or create Outfits on that faction.</font>
This customization adds a Hearts decal to the cockpit glass. VS use only.
Reduces the acquire timer of the Sunderer by 180 seconds.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 192 rounds.
Increases the braking performance of the Lightning by 30%.
Apply the Snakeskin camo pattern to your armor. TR use only.
This bundle provides the full set of schematics from the release of the construction system at a great discount! Unlocks across all factions.
Bring joy to your enemies before you destroy them with this festive Elf horn. NSO use only.
Unable to connect to the video upload system because of an invalid username or password.
Killing a vehicle within 35 meters restores one tick of ammunition for you or your vehicle. <font color="#dc9c36"> Works in vehicles.</font>
Apply the single use Indar Scrub camo pattern to your armor. TR use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 200 rounds.
The semi-automatic AMR-66 battle rifle uses powerful cartridges that hold considerable stopping power up to medium range. TR use only.
Decals are now compatible with cosmetic armor! Go check them out!
Adds flaming trails to the vehicle's wheels. NC use only.

Crouching momentarily will activate a coolant system in your suit. While doused in coolant, burning damage is reduced by 90%, you no longer appear on map-based recon detection, and your movement speed is reduced by 10%. Firing a weapon will immediately end this effect.
Destroy any of the enemy's main battle tanks: Chimera, Prowler, Vanguard or Magrider.
Constructs a large, fortified wall with firing areas for infantry.
Further improve the Vanguard's rotation speed, reverse speed and braking power.
A 3.4x zoom scope useful when engaging targets at greater distances.
While active, the Transport Cloak drains the ANT's stored Cortium in exchange for limited invisibility. Consumes 185 Cortium per second.
Aim down sights to improve accuracy.
Adds violet chassis lights to the under carriage of the Prowler.
Increases the lock-on range of the weapon by 30 meters.

Awarded for mastery of the Galaxy, this Auraxium-infused Lumifiber trim proves its owner's accomplishments in a dropship. NSO only. <font color="#dc9c36">Color of trim changes based on your current faction.</font>
This customization adds a broken glass decal to the Reaver's cockpit.
Increases the Yaw Speed of the aircraft by an additional 5%
Customize your ground vehicle by adding a Gold Vox Hood Ornament.
Used previously as a welding mask, this helmet is also effective in combat to prevent getting hit in the face. NC use only.
Apply the Indar Canyons v2 camo pattern to your armor. All factions can use this gear.
Name cannot contain both Cyrillic and English characters
Passively increases sprint acceleration, deceleration, and recovery speed by 20%, and your hold-breath time recharges 100% faster.
Earn 4 Gold Medals with Assault Rifles
Get started on the right foot with this bundle designed specifically for Engineers!
Adds 20 rounds to the default magazine size.
Kills occasionally reduce damage taken for you and your squad.
Special discounts on vehicle accessories now!
Next rank increase cloaked recharge rate and time cloak can remain active when stationary: Completely drained energy recharges in 12 seconds. Cloak can remain active while moving for 16 seconds.
Use a carbine to kill enemy players.

The front lines are always in need of 'medical professionals' that won't flinch under pressure and you're just the soldier we're looking for. So, grab your kit , report to the nearest battle zone as a Combat Medic, and keep our troops upright and fighting.



Must be a Combat Medic to complete objectives.

Increase the base 30% orbital strike damage resistance of the vehicle to 54% In addition, the vehicle is no longer affected by physics impulses from orbital strikes and other weaponized sources while undeployed.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.2 seconds.
Increases lock on time by 1 second and prevents the vehicle from being auto detected; also generates a cloaking bubble when the vehicle is deployed.
Single Use Sandy Scrub Armor Camo
Now, drive the Sunderer to your waypoint. You'll see it on the HUD and map.
Regenerates 35 health per second when out of combat for 10 seconds, and headshot kills regenerate 100 health over 2 seconds.
The Tempest Capacitor room is lethal to anyone inside while the Tempest Siphon is active. Defenders can toggle the siphon on using a terminal overlooking the room, and attackers can disable it.
This customization changes the color of the cockpit glass to JetBlack. All factions can use this gear.
Increases xp and resource gain by 100% and squad xp gain by 5% for 30 minutes. Boost can only be used on this character.

<font color="#00FFAA">Field Officer Knightly:</font> Stop by the Observation Deck before you promise anything to Nanite Systems. The Terran Republic has a high priority mission for you as well, soldier.
Apply the single use Amerish Leaf camo pattern to your weapon. NC use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
When spawned the vehicle will have 7500 cortium in the tank instead of 5000.

Trades 40 Synthium for 176 Auraxium.

Uses resources in the Outfit Armory.
Adds 5 rounds to the default magazine size.

<font color="#00FFAA">Facilitator Campner:</font> I have been informed that you have delivered a physical copy of the Earth game, checkers. It is complete with all game pieces made of authentic plastic. Your assistance has been noted.

The Charged Proton RAD is a heavy-hitting radiation plasma cannon. Upon impact, a 10 meter cloud of radioactive gas will harm targets inside the cloud for 10 seconds. This cannon requires a charge before it can be fired.
Time to bug out, the facility is lost.
Liberty Arsenal forged this special variant of the LA1 Anchor in recognition of the weapon's long-term performance in the hands of a skillful operator.
Two years fighting the good fight!
Improved hover, air brake and vertical thrust.
Weapons equipped with Darklight Flashlights can illuminate cloaked Infiltrators.
Convoys that support the defending team leave from this location.
Now eliminate Terran Republic and Vanu Sovereignty targets.
This device creates an energetic field that drastically increases jump height.
Applies automated targeting systems to nearby constructed turrets, allowing them fire upon enemies while unmanned. Requires a nearby Silo to power the module.
<font color="#00FFAA">Representative Foster:</font> When the Warpgate detonation took place, it seemed selective in what it destroyed. The vehicles you analyzed, for example, were simply disabled.
Active Hardline Interference Volume Emitters (HIVEs) process Cortium which contributes to control of the continent.
You will have to compensate for recoil by adjusting your aim while you shoot.
Auraxis Firearms' first venture into MAX weaponry was the AF-23 Grinder. It features an extended ammo reserve for sustained fire. NC use only.
VS Black Ops Armor Set Bundle
Increases afterburner fuel replenishment rate by 15% and afterburner fuel capacity by 40%.
TR: Customization - Sniper Rifle Bolt Driver Promo
Increases the Idle Timer on the Vanguard to 9 minutes.
Increases the maximum amount of cortium the vehicle can store.
Apply the Cracked Earth camo pattern to your armor. TR use only.
Further reduces the reuse timer of the Radar Scrambler.
Killing an enemy while wielding a melee weapon or sidearm restores 325 health. This effect does not trigger on quick melee attacks.
This controls the number of simultaneous sound channels
Resupplies ammo to ally vehicles within 23 meters.
White Lumifiber XW Trim for the Valkyrie. TR use only.
A.S.P is available to any Battle Rank 100+ player. Enlisting will reset rank progression and allow unlocking of special class modifications every 25 ranks.
Customize your Liberator with these sleek Viper Fins. NC use only.

We've received a string of requests for support from our forces stationed near The Shattered Warpgate in northeastern Esamir. We're deploying soldiers with flexible skillsets to assist with the evolving battle conditions in that region.



Objectives must be completed in the Shattered Warpgate region.
Apply the Amerish Leaf camo pattern to your weapon. All factions can use this gear.
Kill enemy players with the NSX Tengu.

Nanite Systems' first attempts into close-range weaponry resulted in the powerful Baron G5. The tube fed Baron is able to put down targets at longer ranges than typical shotguns thanks to its narrow choke.
Wraps your Lightning in an obsidian trim. All factions can use this.
Killing an enemy will recharge the Adrenaline Shield's capacitor by 38%.
Select the method of payment you wish to purchase Daybreak Cash.

<font color="#00FFAA">Field Officer Knightly:</font> Soldier, I assume you have already read the mission briefing, so I'll cut straight to the point. If there really is an off-world facility then we must claim it for the Republic. So, gear up and head to the marked Containment Site. I will contact you again once you're there.
Alpha Squad Resource and XP Boost
Allows squad members to spawn directly into your vehicle.
When inside a vehicle the Combat Medic will passively heal 30 health per second to allied soldiers within 5 meters.
Adds 2 grenades to the default magazine size.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 8 missiles.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 336 rounds.
Further increases the MAX's fire rate while in Overdrive.
Increases outfit resource contributions for 3 days. Boost can only be used on this character.
Adds 8 rounds to the default magazine size.
Contains a Hunter QCX plus 1000 Certs
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 200 rounds.
The video capture system encountered a bad file. (Bad data)
Customize your Flash with this purple blinking antenna ball. VS use only.
The fully automatic NS-61 Emissary operates comfortably at mid-range, thanks to its accuracy and large magazine. All factions can use this weapon.
Kill confirmed. I'm sure our benefactor will be pleased. Your share of the reward is ready to be claimed.
The Nebula VM20's overclocked power core interface allows for a rapid rate of fire to quickly dispatch enemy infantry in close quarters. VS use only.
Increases the Idle Timer on the Magrider to 15 minutes.
Wearable by all non-Max classes. TR use only.
Removes the speed penalty when reloading an empty magazine, but the weapon will recoil more harshly in one direction while firing.
Only a Harasser pulled from a warpgate vehicle terminal will contain the messages. We will relay the destination once you are in possession of the vehicle.
Restores 25% of your maximum cloaking energy when your shield is shattered.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 3 missiles.
Applies a decal to your vehicle. NC use only.
Infiltrator: Kill 10 enemies while being healed by a Medic
Adds Lumifiber Trim to the Prowler. TR use only.
Nanite Systems has authorized a sale on certain Nanite Systems products!
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 100 rockets.
Support Planetside 2 with Membership and get great benefits too!
Apply the Digital camo pattern to your armor. VS use only.
The NC2S Gauss Compact possesses a select-fire mode that further diversifies the usage of the already adaptable carbine. NC use only.
Adds the Baron style hubcaps to your Sunderer. NC use only.
Increases the amount of ammunition in each magazine by 50%.
The Corona O3.4 is a magnified target acquisition optic suited to open-field combat.
Unable to join squad because you are already in one.
Have we told you today that you're the best? You're the best.
Your radar signature no longer appears on detection devices outside of 26 meters.
Applies a decal to your armor. NC use only.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 12 shots.
Killing targets with Halloween event weapons.
Apply the single use Jungle Forest camo pattern to your vehicle. NC use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
Capture Indar within the time limit
Supplies ammo to nearby ally vehicles.
Increases the Idle Timer on the Mosquito to 7 minutes.
The Terran Republic has taken Dahaka!
The M6 Onslaught was designed as a defensive alternative to the MX1, allowing for a higher rate of fire suitable for holding down important locations. TR use only.
Scout Radar detects the movement of hostiles at a range of 100 meters.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 563 rounds.
Learn how to get coordinated on the battlefield.
Apply the Plasma camo pattern to your weapon. VS use only.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 1013 rounds.
Apply the Rock Lichen camo pattern to your vehicle. TR use only.
Scythe Death From Above Glass Decal
Mentor squads are recommended for newer players. Would you like to join a Mentor squad instead?
TR: MAX: Flame 01: Right Gold Medal
On a headshot kill, instantly restore 120 shield.
Contains 5 random implants and one charger!
The Pelter Rocket Pod launches a barrage of unguided anti-armor rockets which have little explosive yield. All factions can use this weapon.
Increases the time required for seeking weapons to establish a lock by 1 second, prevents the vehicle being auto detected on the mini-map and blocks enemy Engagement Radars.
Allows Shotguns to be equipped in the secondary weapon slot. Does not include Directive reward weapons. Engineer only.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.4 seconds.
Increases the roll rate of the Mosquito by 8 degrees/second.
Taking fall damage will cloak you for a short time.
Changes how to display the game. Windowed mode may decrease performance. (Default: Fullscreen)
Orphaned - Post Launch - Do not translate. Mosquito Inertial Dampener - Level 4
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 30 rounds.
Applies a camo to your armor. All factions can use this gear.
Prevent the Vanu Sovereignty from locking Esamir
Unlock specialized grenades for the Light Assault. Grenades can be equipped on the loadout screen.
Retrieve Foster's Gift from Eisa Tech Plant
Cannot set destination too close to current position
The 4th Anniversary Edition AF-4 Cyclone submachine gun offers higher damage output than most weapons in its class. NC use only.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.3 seconds.
This unconventional hatchet has been designed to sow maximum terror on the battlefield. TR use only.
Adds a cosmetic attachment to your ANT. All factions can use this gear.
Nanites constantly repair damage over time at a rate of 4.38% every 5 seconds. Damage disables auto repair for 12 seconds.
Customize your Flash with the Bracer Guard. TR use only.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 300 rounds.
<font color="#00FFAA">SPRK-33:</font> *CRACKLE* *HISS* *SPARK* *SPARK* (The Black Market is pleased with your efforts. Payment is now available.)
Increases the ability to isolate heat sources in low light conditions. The range on Thermal Optics is typically shorter when compared to standard night vision.

The Mosquito is a one man air superiority fighter in use exclusively by the Terran Republic. Decades of refinement have made this aircraft the quickest and most agile of all the empire-specific aircrafts.
Killing an enemy while wielding a melee weapon or sidearm restores 325 health. This effect does not trigger on quick melee attacks.
"Gee, I wish I could get great benefits and support PS2"
Capture active Vanu Relics. Active Relics will change when timer expires.
Apply the single use Urban Forest camo pattern to your vehicle. NC use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
Apply the Ink Spots camo pattern to your armor. VS use only.
Customize your aircraft with these sleek Tiger Fins. VS use only.
Adds Lumifiber Trim to the Harasser. VS use only.
Customize your ground vehicle by adding a Crossed Shotguns Hood Ornament. NC use only.
Support PS2 with Membership and everyone wins!
Allows the use of low rocket-assisted jumps with a short cooldown.
<font color="#00FFAA">SPRK-33:</font> *SPARK* *CRACKLE* *SPARK* *HISS* (This no doubt means that he'll provide a battery if you kill enemies with a Lightning tank.)
Reduces screen shake and prevents you from being thrown by knockback effects.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.5 seconds.
Apply the Woven Web camo pattern to your armor. NC use only.
Mass Drivers are capable of launching two 50mm rounds accurately and at a high speed. The Mass Driver must reload after each shot. VS use only.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.8 seconds.
Consumes nanites to bend light around the infiltrator, resulting in near perfect invisibility while motionless. Nanites regenerate over time.
Reduces minimum cone of fire and cone of fire recovery time.
